document_data.name: Takegai Yodori
document_data.mainbody: '''Takegai Yodori''' was a wandering [[shugenja]] of the noble [[Takegai clan]] in [[Kozakura]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Yodori acted as a courier for [[Takegai Uezami]], the head of the council of state and a high-ranking member of the Takegai clan. Yodori traveled all Kozakura to deliver messages to Uezami's allies.
document_data.Personality: Yodori was totally devoted to his clan. He was an ambitious, energetic, and serious individual.
